    Method json()

    Usage

    gWalk$json(
  filename = ".",
  save = TRUE,
  verbose = FALSE,
  annotations = NULL,
  nfields = NULL,
  efields = NULL,
  stack.gap = 1e+05,
  include.graph = TRUE,
  settings = list(y_axis = list(title = "copy number", visible = TRUE)),
  cid.field = NULL,
  no.y = FALSE
)

    Usage

  gr = NULL,
  graph = NULL,
  by = NULL,
  collapse = TRUE,
  na.rm = TRUE,
  avg = FALSE,
  sep = ",",
  FUN = default.agg.fun.generator(na.rm = na.rm, sep = sep, avg = avg)
)

    Method clone()

    The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

    Usage

    gWalk$clone(deep = FALSE)

    Arguments

    deep

    Whether to make a deep clone.
